sources.title: The Headline Woman
sources.description: Smug reporter with dinky, bifurcated moustache aids young woman suspected of murder. Details in next edition.

sources.title: The Headline Woman (1935) CRIME THRILLER
sources.description:
Stars: Heather Angel, Roger Pryor, Ford Sterling
 Director: William Nigh

 When the daughter of a newspaper publisher is falsely charged with murder, a reporter on her father's paper goes into hiding with her. At first hoping to get an exclusive story, the reporter eventually finds himself falling in love and trying to find the real killer.

sources.title: The Headline Woman (1935) Action, Crime, Drama Full Length Movie

sources.title: The Headline Woman (1935; smallest download)
sources.description: Actors: Roger Pryor; Heather Angel; Jack La Rue; Jack Mulhall; Ford Sterling Runtime: 1:15:16 This is in the public domain because the copyright wasn't renewed after 28 years.
